articles.description: The Ducks held their second scrimmage and 11th overall spring practice Saturday at what eventually became a cool, windy and wet Autzen Stadium.
articles.content:
EUGENE The defense got the better of Oregons second spring scrimmage.
The Ducks held their second scrimmage and 11th overall spring practice Saturday at what eventually became a cool, windy and wet … [+1624 chars]
